name: WAMULocalNewscast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Follow the latest local news from WAMU, your NPR news station in Washington, D.C.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move WAMU to the top of your news brief.
